subdisciplines.name: Magnetic Confinement Fusion
subdisciplines.description: The use of magnetic fields to confine plasma to produce fusion.

subdisciplines.name: Inertial Confinement Fusion
subdisciplines.description: The use of intense laser or particle beams to compress and heat a small target of fuel, causing fusion.

subdisciplines.name: Plasma Diagnostics
subdisciplines.description: The use of various measurement techniques to study the properties of plasma.

subdisciplines.name: Plasma Processing
subdisciplines.description: The use of plasma to modify the surface or properties of materials.

subdisciplines.name: Space Plasmas
subdisciplines.description: The study of plasmas in space, including the solar wind, planetary magnetospheres, and other space environments.
